2100590.name: Yupi Road 2 World
2100590.description:
Yupi Road 2 World is a 2D platform game in which Yupi, a kind alien, must save the Earth from a catastrophe.

In Yupi Road 2 World, players take control of Yupi, an alien from the planet Pompastic. Yupi is a member of the Slimers, a race of kind creatures dedicated to helping other planets.

Yupi is forced to land on Earth after a catastrophe at the North Pole releases a large amount of energy. This energy attracts the Bombyx, hostile alien creatures that threaten to destroy Earth.

Players must help Yupi traverse the levels of Earth, avoiding or using enemies to make his way. Yupi can jump, run and use his power boots to launch himself through the air.
2100590.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
